9AHN.SG.summary: AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited engages in the manufacture and distribution of automobile parts, dies, and jigs in Thailand, China, Malaysia, and Portugal. The company operates in three segments: Manufacture of Automobiles Assembly Tools and Parts; Sales of Automobiles and Provision of Automobiles Repair Service; and Others. It offers stamped or pressed parts, including chassis frame components, housing axles parts, pressed and stamped body parts, door check link, and brake lines, fuel lines, engine, and brazing parts; forged and machined parts, such as transmission, power train, steering, and suspension systems, engine, shafts, wheel hubs, and other parts, as well as connecting rods and copper forged parts; and plastic parts and plastic fuel tanks. The company also provides fuel lines, brake lines, engine parts, roof ditch moldings, belt line moldings, door sash products, brazed steel tubing, door checks and hinges, and parking brake lever products; assembly jigs; and stamping dies. In addition, the company is involved in the sale of automobiles; provision of automobile repair, training, technical support, and information technology consulting and advisory services; venture capital business; investment in other companies; and import and export of vehicles and parts. Further, it manufactures 3D car navigation and digital map solutions under the POWERMAP brand with voice activation software, as well as Oracle ERP systems; and operates car dealership service centers. AAPICO Hitech Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Ayutthaya, Thailand.

C9W.SG.short_name: Chai Watana Tannery PCL Reg. Sh
C9W.SG.long_name: Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited
C9W.SG.summary: Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited manufactures and exports leather finished products. It operates through six segments: Tannery Hide, Automotive Leather Cutting, Dog Chewable Toys, Furniture, Energy Business, and Design and Distribution of Aluminum Boat and Mini Bus. The company offers trim seat covers, steering wheels and gear knobs, and raw hide dog chews, as well as cutting, spray, and beam house and tanning services. In addition, it is involved in the design and distribution of boats and minibuses; rental of properties; provision of consulting services for renewable energy projects; waste management business; wholesale of wood chips; and generation and sale of electricity using waste fuels. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

CPR-R.BK.long_name: CPR Gomu Industrial Public Company Limited
CPR-R.BK.summary: CPR Gomu Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells natural and synthetic rubber parts, moldings, and components for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand and internationally. It also produces and sells metals and metal pipes. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Wangnoi, Thailand.

CPR.BK.long_name: CPR Gomu Industrial Public Company Limited
CPR.BK.summary: CPR Gomu Industrial Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells natural and synthetic rubber parts, moldings, and components for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand and internationally. It also produces and sells metals and metal pipes. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Wangnoi, Thailand.

GYT-R.BK.summary: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

GYT.BK.summary: Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells motor vehicle and aero tires in Thailand. The company also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Pathumthani, Thailand. Goodyear (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

HFT-R.BK.long_name: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited
HFT-R.BK.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes tires and inner tubes in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Sale of Goods and Investment. It offers tires and tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, and small logistics vehicles. The company markets its products under the DUNLOP, DURO, Q-UICK, and PREMIUM HFT brands. It is also involved in investing in bonds and securities; and the wholesale and retail trade of tires and tubes, and equipment for vehicles. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand. Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Hwa Fong Rubber Industries Company Limited.

HFT.BK.long_name: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited
HFT.BK.summary: Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes tires and inner tubes in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, the United States, and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Sale of Goods and Investment. It offers tires and tubes for bicycles, motorcycles, and small logistics vehicles. The company markets its products under the DUNLOP, DURO, Q-UICK, and PREMIUM HFT brands. It is also involved in investing in bonds and securities; and the wholesale and retail trade of tires and tubes, and equipment for vehicles. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Samutprakarn, Thailand. Hwa Fong Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Hwa Fong Rubber Industries Company Limited.

IHL-R.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, England, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, and Switzerland. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, and gear knobs, as well as lining leather and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves automotive industry. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

IHL.BK.summary: Interhides Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes leather coverings for car seats and other related products in Thailand, England, China, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines, Japan, Hong Kong, Vietnam, and Switzerland. It offers finished leather products, cut parts, and trim covers for use in car seats, steering wheels, and gear knobs, as well as lining leather and safety shoes. The company also provides spray and tanning services; and bleaching, dyeing finishing, and other services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes hydrolyzed protein from leather scrap. The company also exports its products. It primarily serves automotive industry. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.

INGRS-R.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, rain rails, glass guides, bellows, and EGR pipes and cover, as well as beltline, roof, window, and hinge mouldings; stamping products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

INGRS.BK.summary: Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of automotive components in Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, and India. The company offers roll forming products, such as door sashes, rain rails, glass guides, bellows, and EGR pipes and cover, as well as beltline, roof, window, and hinge mouldings; stamping products; and tool making and automation solutions. It also provides engineering and automatic production system design services. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Ingress Industrial (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Ingress Corporation Berhad.

IRC-R.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. It also offers automotive elastomer products, such as hose air intake, socket covers, lamp and lens gasket, door and front grommets, column hole/cover assy-hole, weather strip inner and hood, shield fuel tank, gauge oil level, door stoppers, trunk lids, weather strip front window, rubber strap and mirror, and plug for automotive industry; and cover rubbers, socket body products, rubber seats, grommets, guide chains, chain guards, vale comp inlets, rollers, sprockets, O-ring, float, pealing fuel, and rubber bushes for motorcycle industry. In addition, the company provides cooling machine rubber cushions for electrical appliances, construction material, container seals, and other products. Further, it manufactures, repairs, and modifies metal molds and equipment for the production of motorcycle tires, tubes, and automotive rubber parts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Thunyaburi, Thailand.

IRC.BK.summary: Inoue Rubber (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company also provides industrial elastomer rubber parts, including rubber bushing, railway rubber, housing gasket, rubber chip, grommet, rubber level crossing, hole protection, covers, cushion rubber, rubber protector, trim bonnet rear, and rubber isolator for sport track, agriculture and fishery, infrastructure project, construction, and other industries. It also offers automotive elastomer products, such as hose air intake, socket covers, lamp and lens gasket, door and front grommets, column hole/cover assy-hole, weather strip inner and hood, shield fuel tank, gauge oil level, door stoppers, trunk lids, weather strip front window, rubber strap and mirror, and plug for automotive industry; and cover rubbers, socket body products, rubber seats, grommets, guide chains, chain guards, vale comp inlets, rollers, sprockets, O-ring, float, pealing fuel, and rubber bushes for motorcycle industry. In addition, the company provides cooling machine rubber cushions for electrical appliances, construction material, container seals, and other products. Further, it manufactures, repairs, and modifies metal molds and equipment for the production of motorcycle tires, tubes, and automotive rubber parts. The company also exports its products. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Thunyaburi, Thailand.

NC2.SI.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
NC2.SI.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore, the United States, China, Vietnam, and Myanmar. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Engineering Business, Plantation, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures and sells ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers, as well as powdered and powdered-free latex examination gloves, escalator handrails, rubber-injection-molded goods, and high pressure hydraulic hoses. The Engineering Business segment provides engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as provides information system services. The Plantation segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, and temperate fruits. The Other Businesses segment offers logistic and other services. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

NDR-R.BK.summary: N.D. Rubber Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes motorcycle tires and tubes in Thailand and internationally. The company offers street, scooter, and off road tires; motorcycle tubes; and air lock, a replacement to motorcycle tube that retains air pressure of tire on spoke rim. It also distributes batteries for motorcycles and automobiles, as well as provides related services; manufactures and distributes rubber and synthetic products for motorcycles and automobiles; researches, manufactures, and distributes wireless electrical equipment and systems; distributes bicycle tires and tubes, and footwear; and manufactures and sells automotive rubber parts. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

PCSGH-R.BK.long_name: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited
PCSGH-R.BK.summary: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automotive parts and electronic products in Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company provides engine parts, transmission parts, final drives, chassis parts, transmission housings, clutch housings, hubs, turbo modules, compressor housings, and throttle-controlled turbo products. It also engages rental of properties. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand.

PCSGH.BK.long_name: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited
PCSGH.BK.summary: P.C.S. Machine Group Holding Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automotive parts and electronic products in Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company provides engine parts, transmission parts, final drives, chassis parts, transmission housings, clutch housings, hubs, turbo modules, compressor housings, and throttle-controlled turbo products. It also engages rental of properties. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand.

PSQ.F.long_name: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited
PSQ.F.summary: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells pick-up axles and truck trunnion shafts in Thailand. It offers axel shafts, disc and drum brakes, exhaust manifolds, leaf springs, stabilizer bars, hot coil springs, and other products. The company also provides its parts for passenger cars, pick-ups, and trucks, as well as for the agriculture machinery industry. In addition, it rents and invests in real estate. The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

SANKO-R.BK.summary: Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes aluminum products and parts in Thailand and internationally. Its automotive parts include alternators/motor start parts, fan clutches, air compressors, safety belts, pipes, water coolers, wipers, and audio parts, as well as headlamp heatsink parts; motorcycle parts comprise carburetors, clutches, cosmetic, housing, and frame arm parts; electric products consisting of CCTV and camcorders; and electric air and pump parts. The company also offers home decoration products from brass, copper, iron, and aluminum by lost wax casting; and tractors, grass cutters, oil, and air compressor parts, as well as mower assembly and components in agricultural industry. Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SANKO.BK.summary: Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes aluminum products and parts in Thailand and internationally. Its automotive parts include alternators/motor start parts, fan clutches, air compressors, safety belts, pipes, water coolers, wipers, and audio parts, as well as headlamp heatsink parts; motorcycle parts comprise carburetors, clutches, cosmetic, housing, and frame arm parts; electric products consisting of CCTV and camcorders; and electric air and pump parts. The company also offers home decoration products from brass, copper, iron, and aluminum by lost wax casting; and tractors, grass cutters, oil, and air compressor parts, as well as mower assembly and components in agricultural industry. Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.

SAT-R.BK.long_name: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited
SAT-R.BK.summary: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells pick-up axles and truck trunnion shafts in Thailand. It offers axel shafts, disc and drum brakes, exhaust manifolds, leaf springs, stabilizer bars, hot coil springs, and other products. The company also provides its parts for passenger cars, pick-ups, and trucks, as well as for the agriculture machinery industry. In addition, it rents and invests in real estate. The company serves original equipment manufacturers and replacement equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Bang Phli, Thailand.

SAT.BK.long_name: Somboon Advance Technology Public Company Limited

SITHAI-R.BK.summary: Srithai Superware Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes household plastic ware and industrial products in Thailand and internationally. It provides various food packaging products, including in-mold labeling and food container products; beverage packaging products comprising PET bottles, closures, and preforms; rigid packaging products; automotive and motorcycle battery cases; material handling products, such as pallets, containers, and crates; garbage bins; plastic furniture products; and stadium, outdoor, auditorium, and unicorn seats, as well as lobby waiting chairs. The company also offers melamine tableware products; and mould for plastic injection. In addition, it operates a super outlet store. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SITHAI.BK.summary: Srithai Superware Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes household plastic ware and industrial products in Thailand and internationally. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

STA-R.BK.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore, the United States, China, Vietnam, and Myanmar. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Engineering Business, Plantation, and Other Businesses. The Engineering Business segment provides engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as provides information system services. The Plantation segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, and temperate fruits. The Other Businesses segment offers logistic and other services. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

TKT-R.BK.summary: T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic parts in Thailand. The company also designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs plastic injection molds. It serves automotive, electrical appliance, and packaging industries, as well as original equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TKT.BK.summary: T.Krungthai Industries Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic parts in Thailand. The company also designs, manufactures, sells, and repairs plastic injection molds. It serves automotive, electrical appliance, and packaging industries, as well as original equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNPC-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited
TNPC-R.BK.summary: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of flexible plastic, synthetic leather, and car mats in Thailand and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), foam sheet, PP foam leather, thermoplastic olefin, and rigid PVC. The company also exports its products. Its products have applications in automotive, sports shoes and balls, furniture, leather, civil engineering, and agriculture industries. Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand.

TNPC.BK.long_name: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited
TNPC.BK.summary: Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited engages in the production and distribution of flexible plastic, synthetic leather, and car mats in Thailand and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride (PVC), foam sheet, PP foam leather, thermoplastic olefin, and rigid PVC. The company also exports its products. Its products have applications in automotive, sports shoes and balls, furniture, leather, civil engineering, and agriculture industries. Thai Nam Plastic Public Company Limited was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samutsakorn, Thailand.

TRU-R.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU-R.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU-R.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TRU.BK.short_name: THAI RUNG UNION CAR PUBLIC COMP
TRU.BK.long_name: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited
TRU.BK.summary: Thai Rung Union Car Public Company Limited engages in the car assembly and modification, and the manufacture and distribution of parts and molds primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Car Assembly and Other Related Car Services; Manufacture of Equipment for Production of Car Accessories; and Sales of Cars, and Car Service Centre Business. It offers tooling products, including dies and molds, and assembly jigs and checking fixtures; auto parts, such as metal stamping and plastic parts; and seats and interior trim products for various motor vehicles. The company also provides contract assembly and sub-assembly services for vehicles, cargo boxes, excavator cabs, etc.; and vehicle modification and painting services. In addition, it is involved in the sale of cars, car accessories, and spare parts; and manufacture of vehicle body parts. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TSC-R.BK.long_name: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited
TSC-R.BK.summary: Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes automobile and motorcycle control cables, and automobile window regulators in Thailand. Its products include accelerator, door lock, fuel lid opener, hood release, key inter lock, parking brake, seat belt, transmission, manual parking release, trunk opener, and engine start cables; and motorcycle products comprise brake, clutch, seat lock, speed meter, tachometer, and throttle cables. The company serves automobile and motorcycle manufacturers, and spare parts centers. It also exports its products. Thai Steel Cable Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

UP-R.BK.summary: Union Plastic Public Company Limited manufactures and sells thermoplastics in Thailand. The company offers various plastic parts, including automotive parts, electrical appliances, household products, and vacuum bottles; and molds comprising automotive parts, electrical appliances, sanitary wares, and others. It also provides contract manufacturing and repair services for molds; and technical support services, including design assistance, material selection, and packaging concepts. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

YTAA.F.long_name: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited
YTAA.F.summary: Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes natural rubber products in Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore, the United States, China, Vietnam, and Myanmar. The company operates in four segments: Natural Rubber Products, Engineering Business, Plantation, and Other Businesses. The Natural Rubber Products segment manufactures and sells ribbed smoked sheets, concentrated latex, and block rubbers, as well as powdered and powdered-free latex examination gloves, escalator handrails, rubber-injection-molded goods, and high pressure hydraulic hoses. The Engineering Business segment provides engineering services that include research and development of machinery and production processes, as well as provides information system services. The Plantation segment engages in the plantation activities, such as rubber, palm, and temperate fruits. The Other Businesses segment offers logistic and other services. Sri Trang Agro-Industry Public Company Limited was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Hat Yai, Thailand.

YUASA-R.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. It also offers industrial batteries. The company offers its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. It serves original and replacement equipment markets. The company also exports its products. Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.

YUASA.BK.summary: Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes batteries for automobiles and motorcycles in Thailand. It also offers industrial batteries. The company offers its products under the YUASA brand name, as well as under private brands, such as THUNDERLITE and YUCON. It serves original and replacement equipment markets. The company also exports its products. Yuasa Battery (Thailand) Public Company Limited is headquartered in Samutprakan, Thailand.
